password sent: Your password has been changed. Please log back in using your new password.
valid link required: You will need a valid reset link in order to reset your password.
go to forgotten password: Click below to go to the forgot password screen.

errors.min length: Please make sure your password is at least 8 characters long.
errors.not same: Please make sure your password is same as the password above.
errors.submit error: There was an error with resetting your password. Please try again and contact support if the problem persists.
